member.name: M:RanorexTestFramework.utilities.UtilityMethods.GetAlterDate(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: GetAlterDate static method returns the time in the specified format (by default it returns MM/dd/yy format e.x., 10/15/14)
member.param: format of the date (dafault date format is "MM/dd/yy")
member.returns: returns the current date as MM/dd/yy as default, For past date you need pass nagative values. ex: if day=-1 it consider yesterday date like if month=-1 it returns past month date
